Uses of XYDataset in org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.data
 

Subinterfaces of XYDataset in org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.data
 interface AppendableXYDataset
          This interface provides a mechanism for appending elements to an XY dataset elements, such as dealing with incoming sensor network data or financial data.
 interface RangeMutableXYDataset
          Interface used by dataset implementations that support inplace modification of Y values
 interface UpdateableXYDataset
          This interface must be implemented by any dataset implementation that expects modifications to occur.
 

Classes in org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.data that implement XYDataset
 class AbstractUpdateableArrayXYDataset
          Base class for datasets wishing to provide the UpdateableXYDataset functionality
 class AppendableArrayXYDataset
          An implementation of the AppendableXYDataset interface using arrays.
 class ArrayXYDataset
           
 class MockXYDataset
          Sample canned dataset used for testing
